info.title: Online Order API
info.description: A basic API to work with Swagger tools

/orders.description: This path is used to retrieve all the order data from the orders.json file

/neworder.description: This path is used to add a new order to the orders.json file

/update/{id}.summary: Update the state of an order
/update/{id}.description: This path is used to change the status of an order matching the provided id. It modifies the state attribute of each order

/delete/{id}.description: This path is used to delete an order with a matching id
